views.markdown:
Set a background for the Control Center on iOS 10+

Configure the tweak in settings.

Enable in settings, pick an image, the tweak takes care of everything it even auto-resprings!

As of right now Noctis and other dark mode tweaks for the CC aren't supported.

When using Noctis or any other CC tweak make sure Legacy is set to off or it may affect performance.

-Fixed legacy mode issues (broke in the last update). -Fixed issues with random resprings (due to memory leak from useless code). -Removed useless code. -Fixed slow and laggy CC when opened. -Fixed issue where the Music/Volume CC page wouldn't apply image (broke it last update due to the old CCWallCustomizer Method)
-Renamed Use Old CCWallCustomizer to Legacy Edition
-Improved performance with Noctis, Horseshoe, Polus, and CCNoFloating


-Added the ability to use the layout from 1.1-1 since some users needed the ability for transparency as it was in that version.
-Note that when you use that function It will affect the way the new method works from 1.1-3.


-Fixed an issue where an image would appear to be stretched due to the wrong aspect ratio (landscape and portrait).
-Added an alert for the user to choose between a cropped an uncropped image.
-Added the ability to choose from different albums instead of just moments.
-Should be less laggy now.
-Added new options in settings
-Bug Fixes
-Optimization of Code
-Hopefully fixed the auto-respring issue with iPhone 7 & 7+ users on iOS 10.0-10.1.1

-Noctis and Horseshoe should now work too!
